Name: Coinon
About the game: GamePlay: Find and retrieve all the coins in town to level up before time runs out. Features: • Levels: Find coins to level up. Some levels add more time to the timer. • Timer: If the timer gets to low, game over. • Food: Pickup food for energy. • Coins: The goal is to collect them all to win each level. • Town: A toon town filled with coins to collect. • Energy: energy drops over time. If energy is 0, game over.
